1.content:
A person wearing a full black hooded cloak over a black trench coat in the pale moonlight and on the back of the cloak is a symbol of a crossed sword and guitar in light grey dust glitter. Looking at the cloak in a different angle, there are another two symbols on both sides of the strange coat of arms. On the right, a yellow gold outline of a bat and on the left is a white outline of the black knight chess piece. The person looked up to the moon and felt calm while revealing their eyes. A gold dragon/wolf eye their right eye and a blood red fox eye for their left eye. The color of his face is a perfect tan that most would kill for without using tanning beds or the fake spray on tan in a can.

Underneath the cloak and coat is a black shirt, pants, socks, dark silver undershirt, and black steel-toed combat boots. His name is Yin ‘Ace’ Kamen, but he likes to be called ace by his friends. On the left of his waist, is a practice wooden sword with a hilt looking a revolver pistol.

‘I think that dust shop is still open.’ Yin thought as he made a turn.

‘Aki did like the two symbols on my cloak after having mom help her put them on.’ He thought as the dust shop ‘From Dust till Dawn’ came into view.

He came into the shop and noticed a girl listening to some music before looking at the dust crystals in the shop cases. Checking his wallet, yin found enough the dust crystals he needs and parts for a new type of weapon.

“One dust crystal of each type please.” Yin asked handing the clerk the money for the dust crystals.

The clerk was surprised to see the money, but nodded anyway and went to complete the order. When the clerk returned with the dust crystals, they are in a case before yin stored them in his scroll and walking over to the music section joining the girl. Like the girl, he also had a pair of personal headphones to listen to music like “Monster” or any good rock music that he could relate with. He looked at the time before sighing it was time to go home, but he still could get those parts for his new weapon idea.

“Do you have this list of parts I’m looking for?” Yin asked the clerk handing him his list of parts. The clerk took a glance at this list before nodding again and went to get the parts for his new weapons. Taking the money from his wallet, he made sure that it was enough for the parts and gave the clerk the money for the parts. Soon he had everything on his list so he left the shop as the girl turns to the cloak on his back and the symbols on it.

(Fight: ruby vs henchman: skip as canon)

As ruby was fighting torchwick, yin was watching from the shadows and felt that he had to help. Sending aura into his legs, he jumped onto the roof of the building next to ruby give or take some feet for distance. Noticing an adult woman with platinum blonde hair (glynda goodwitch) jumping in to help her.

Gripping his practice sword, his aura started to glow dark red with a black outline surrounding his body. Unsheathing the practice sword, he sent a dark blue aura wave at the hiding lava user and it did do some damage. Ruby and the witch turned to see yin landing next to them after jumping over the gap between the buildings by using a bit more aura in his legs. Yin with a bit of focus made an aura shaped of his practice sword after pulling it from his real practice sword.

“Professor Goodwitch, before you even think of me as a plain young man I’m the son of general Kamen, my mother.” He said surprising her as ruby was confused to see the son of a female general.

Yin turned to look at the lava user (cinder falls) as he pulled his hood down.

‘So the black knight is here; this will things more interesting or problematic.’ The lava user thought.

‘She has made her choice so I will have to stop her.’ Yin thought as his grip tighten on both of his swords.

Feeling the slight drain of his aura, his eyes locked on to the bullhead and sent waves of aura at the lava user who fired several lava shots to deflect the aura waves. One or two of the aura waves managed to hit the bullhead. Ruby and glynda shook their heads to be rid of the shock. Ruby was firing bullets from her condense rifle as glynda summoned ice from storm clouds. Ruby focused her shots to the cockpit as the witch used the ice to hit the bullhead; yin is focused on the lava user. Blasting aura wave after aura wave, seeing some of them do damage while others get blocked by lava shots. Soon a piece of ice pierced the window of the cockpit of the bullhead and it started to descend to the ground.

The aura sword turned black with a dark red outline; the witch lowered the bullhead to the ground using her semblance before yin fired one last aura wave at the engine. He let the aura sword fade away and breathing fairly hard while feeling the drain on his aura.

“At least training won’t be as hard with that now, but mom is still a general for a reason.” Yin said as he was drinking some water from a flask. He was about to jump off to the ground before he heard a whistling sound; he turned to see a walking cliché (roman torchwick) pointing his cane at ruby.

Following the aim of sight, yin noticed a dust crystal and to him it was a rare type of dust crystal. His body glowing with aura, yin ran to push both ruby and the witch out of the way catching the crystal. Taking a batter’s stance, yin hit the shot right back with his practice sword at the cliché. After the smoke cleared, the cliché and the lava user were gone and the dust was left behind.

“They got away without the dust and you can thank me for saving your lives.” Yin said holding the rare dust type in his right hand.

“Wow, is your semblance speed too?” Ruby asked him

“Sorry, but I don’t know what my semblance is yet. I have been using my aura so I have no idea of how long it will take for me to unlock it.” He said as he noticed his mother’s car driving down the road to the bullhead.

“Well, she must have come for me and the rouge bullhead.” He said before turning back to goodwitch and ruby.

“If you want this to stay quiet, both of you will have to meet the general.” He said to glynda before jumping down to greet his mother. Being a witch, she and ruby jumped after him before floating down not getting hurt. In front of yin is a woman with dark red hair braided and wrapped around her neck like a scarf. Wearing a dark green with brown trim general outfit with medals on her coat from different kingdoms and she is left with a slender build and well-toned muscle, DD-cup, and a slim ass.

“Kaa-chan, were you following me again?” He asked like this wasn’t the first time.

“No, but I know you were taking a walk and buying dust for your future weapons.” General kamen said to him before hugging him closely and noticed ruby and goodwitch standing behind him.

“So you stayed to help stop torchwick stealing from the shop you were buying from.“ she said as he nodded. Ruby’s eyes became like star before running to him.

“You said something about weapons?” Ruby asked as goodwitch came up to them.

“Yeah give me a second though.” He said before walking over to the shop keeper and paid for the rare dust crystal, but it was a gift for stopping the robbers from running with the stolen dust. He smiled before putting it into a small case and storing it into his scroll.

“Custom scroll.” He said answering ruby’s unasked question.

(Cut to the interrogation)

Ruby was sitting at a table with a single light over her head and yin stayed with her so his mother is sitting in a corner watching goodwitch, but felt happy that her son might have found a friend.

(Skip goodwitch rant)

“So Ozpin still the headmaster of beacon?” Simone asked as a grey/silver headed male walked into the room with a plate of cookies and a mug of coffee (Ozpin).

“Imagine my surprise to see remnant’s first female general and said general to have an army of both humans and faunus soldiers.” He said with a small smile as she smirked at his greeting.

“One of her titles I personally found funny was The Bloody Tomato.” Yin said before receiving a whack upside his head from his mother.

“So mean Sochi-kun.” She whined and ruby was laughing at the title. Yin smiled before seeing ruby eat the cookies.

“Ruby Rose, you have…….silver eyes.” Ozpin said in a monotone voice staring into her eyes.
1.title: Prologue

11.content:
“Oh, have one.” She said as she handed yin a cookie.

“Thanks ruby.” He said breaking it in half before chucking one half to his mother who ate it in one bite while he was eating his own half.

“It’s unusual to see the son of the general without his hood to cover his eyes.” Ozpin said

“First of Ozzy, I’m a full-blooded human. My eyes are something from a story my uncle raven about The Avatars of Light and Darkness.” Yin explained as a very large and thick book heading for his head before he caught it without risking injury and he knew who through it. Both ruby and his mother started to pull out their weapons.

“Hmm, little simone and the kid are like with a reaction like that.” A new voice said.

“Uncle Raven.” Yin said as he had a hand laying on the book.

“Brother dear.” Simone greeted her brother.

“Sorry to interrupt the family gathering, but we are in the middle of something.” Goodwitch said adjusting her glasses as simone nodded.

“What story of the Avatars of Light and Darkness?” Ozpin asked intrigued.

“It’s a legend that goes back to when dust was founded to fight off the grim.” Raven said.

(Legend of the Twin Avatars: skip)

“The grimm had a master, but depending of whether or not of the gender of the avatar of darkness. If light was male then darkness was female. With each set of twin avatars, the switch genders like after the example, light would be female and darkness would be male. Then it would switch again in each new set, but the main goal of them is not to fight each other but help each other in saving the world and defeating a grand evil, a true evil. The avatar of darkness had the grimm attack only those of evil intent with no chance of returning to light.” Raven explained.

“Uncle has special eyes that lets him see if the person he is seeing is one of the avatars.” Yin said and raven nodded confirming it.

“Interesting, two people selected randomly at birth to wield special abilities.” Ozpin said drinking his coffee.

“Each pair has to stop an event that could end the world.” Simone said as she too knew the story after raven talked some sense into her when confronting her about yin’s eyes.

“This legend is not known like the history of how dust was found to give us the means to fight back against the grimm..” Raven said and ozpin nodded drinking more coffee from his mug.

“Did one of the avatars went evil?” Ruby asked as yin smiled.

“I tried to find anything that suggested the light avatar went evil, but I haven’t found anything. Some of the darkness avatars did go down the dark path while others didn’t, but hate in the darkness avatars builds in each life and it hasn’t been released yet.” Raven explained and ruby nodded understanding it.

“Were the two in love?” She asked as yin snorted.

“Each pair either had true love or treated the other as brother/sister so like family.” He said.

Raven left the room with the book and simone leaving yin with ruby and the two huntsmen.

(ozpin talk with ruby: skip)

Ozpin and goodwitch turned to yin.

“I have been home taught by my mother or the general if you want her respect so I could defend myself and others if need be.” Yin said before sighing. “I don’t hate her, but I want out of her shadow.” He added as ozpin nodded.

“Interesting and you don’t have a real weapon on you, but make due with a practice sword and your aura.” He said as goodwitch reveal the footage of him fighting the lava user.

“I have more aura than the normal person huntsmen or not. I have been training to find out my semblance, but I haven’t figured it out yet.” Yin said before throwing his wooden sword out of the room through the door without breaking it hitting his uncle in the crotch, as he was laughing before going into the fetal position.

What surprised them was that it phased through the door and the adults left the room leaving ruby and yin to talk.

“So you have any idea of what you want for a weapon?” Ruby asked and he nodded.

“A new type of weapon that no one has seen yet.” He said.

“I have the dust and the parts I need but I don’t have the skill to make it.” He added with a small frown.

“I can help you make them but you need something like blueprints or a picture of what form you want them to take.” She said and he nodded with a smile.

“If yin has more than one semblance than the rest will come from his role as the avatar of darkness. Ruby isn’t the light one from what I have seen, but she is in relation to the that is.” Raven said as simone nodded with ozpin looking at the kids with a smile before sipping the rest of his coffee.

“A person having more than one semblance is unheard of and frankly impossible.” Goodwitch said adjusting her glasses

“You have seen his faunus eyes and I know that he is born human with no faunus traits in my family.” Simone refuted that claim.

“Letting him go to beacon will let him choose his own path and help him with walking the path as the avatar of darkness. I want him to be different from me and be his own person.” Simone explained and ozpin nodded.

“Will he need a bullhead to pick him up and take him to the academy?” Goodwitch asked.

“No need. I’ll send him on my way to the base.” She said as goodwitch nodded.

“He doesn’t know that he met summer rose a few years ago. Raven was staying with me in the base helping to train yin.” Simone said with a solemn look at the mentioned huntresses.

“How did he meet her?” Ozpin asked interesting.

“He simply bumped into her and got a cookie from her. She called him cute while called his eyes interesting and told him she liked his eyes.” She giggled at the cute memory of a small blushing yin.

“Is raven still at the base?” Ozpin asked

“Unless she moved to another place then she is still at the base till I get a notice about her leaving.” Simone said

(Ruby and yang meeting: canon and skip)
11.title: A new friend

111.content:
“So you met the son of the strongest female general?” Yang asked with a yang like smile.

“I heard that he is the dark knight and overprotective of his little sister. I can relate with watching over you though.” She said with a real kind smile and hugged ruby.

“Plus I have to thank him for saving you.” She said as the hug turned near bone crushing.

A black trailer pulled up as a door opened to reveal yin riding on a black as night futuristic motorcycle. The detail and graphics are of a dark horse and a pale white moon. The only thing known about the motorcycle is that it’s called a spyder. A black helmet with dark red flames on the sides resting on the fuel tank. Yang tore up the bar the night his mother and father were at and she experienced firsthand what made his mother who she was. She had to spend the night watching his little sister and aki took a liking to yang so she wanted her around more often.

Yin chuckled hearing how his mother got yang to watch aki and he knew that she was over protective of ruby. She is on his good side and ruby is a friend to him leaning to good friend or a best friend.

“Be good sochi; I’ll give you a call when I can and check up on you.” Simone said as yin nodded.

“They have a place for you on the bullhead and the counsel know they can’t do anything to you if you are the dark avatar. Your uncle hasn’t found the light avatar light, but I have a feeling that yang girl would be the one.” She said as yin smirked seeing both ruby and yang standing next to the trailer.

“Yeah, that would be ironic.” He said shaking his head.

“Morning ruby and her sister, yang.” He greeted the sisters though not seeing yang before this would be the first time he actually meeting her.

“So mean sochi-kun.” Simone called out before yin drove off the trailer and she had the trailer drove off so she could get to her base. Yin was chuckling at his mother.

“Hi yin.” Ruby greeted her friend giggling at the exchange. Yang was staring at him and noticed his eyes, but he noticed her stare at his eyes and sighed.

“My eyes are real faunus eyes, but I’m pure human.” He said with a slight cold tone. He usually gets slightly annoyed with people staring at his eyes.

“How is that possible?” Yang asked

“Special circumstances.” He said before driving off to his room on the bullhead. Ruby followed after him as yang watched her go.

“A bit too cold for me, but a definitely a good friend for ruby.” She muttered to herself as she followed them to his room. Yin slowed down to pull out some pills and give one to a pale looking blonde (vomit boy/jaun arc).

“That will help you with your airsickness.” Yin said also giving him a small bottle of water.

“Thanks. The name is Juan Arc.” He said feeling better thanks already feeling better from the pill.

“Yin Kamen, but call me ace.” Yin said as jaun nodded

“Arc hmm, wasn’t your family were in the last war?” yin asked.

“My great-grandfather, grandfather, and my father were in the last war and I want to be a hero like they were.” Jaun said and yin frowned a little, but nodded.

“We as our parent’s kids can never be like them only better to surpass them or be worse.” Yin said with a wise tone and the three nodded. His scroll beeped before showing a headshot of an ice queen (Weiss Shnee).

“Damn that stalker for my mother.” He said ignoring the call.

“Who was that on your scroll?” Jaun asked

“An ice queen of a stalker for my mother. She uses the same weapon as her and knows her reputation.” Yin said and they nodded.

“So why did you ignore the call?” ruby innocently asked and he smiled.

“I hate people like that and others who try to be my friends just to get on her good side.” He explained as the sisters gulped in fear.

“You two however, are different and yang is a real friend while ruby is close to a good friend or a best friend.” He said as ruby had stars in her eyes while yang pouted.

“And it had nothing to do with dat ass that you have.” Ruby said to her sister sounding like her and yin chuckled at the two. Juan gave him a present from his seven sisters.

“From my sisters, they met your sister and wanted me to give you this, but also try to be a friend to you.” Juan said and yin nodded taking the gift and the friendship.

“I heard about them caring for aki as a sister and it makes my job a little easier with going to beacon and all.” He said agreeing with him.

“I’m going to be brutally honest juan, going to beacon doesn’t seem a good fit for you yet and joining the general’s army would be a better choice.” Yin said to him as he hanged his head.

“Juan, you need training in combat and about aura so you can use it to unlock your semblance.” He added with a true kind smile.

“If you have someone on your team that has training in combat, ask them for help train you. I can’t do it till I get my own weapons.” Yin said as juan nodded.

(flight over beacon canon except for juan not vomiting) skip.

For the rest of the flight, yin was in his room working on the plans for his weapons, which is a new type of weapon and jumped to prevent something from breaking on the floor. Looking up, he noticed it was a picture of the family with a chip on the glass over his mother’s face.

‘Kaa-chan’ yin thought before frowning.

He jumped on to his spydercycle and drove to the pilot of the bullhead. While the students were getting off the bullhead after it landed, ruby and yang were looking for yin since he hasn’t gotten off yet. The bullhead started to take off with yin still on it, but he had something to do and it was more important than going to beacon…for now. He sent ozpin a message that he would be coming back tomorrow after dealing with some personal business regarding to the general.

After Yin finished speaking with the pilot and left the cockpit, he noticed a young man in military uniform, sitting down and polishing his assault rifle. He had messy short, blonde hair. Was quite tall, had quite a muscular body befitting of a soldier and wore the standard Atlas infantry uniform. (Without the helmet) Yin was questioning to himself why an Atlesian soldier was onboard the Beacon academy flight. Then he thought it would probably be easier to just ask him.

The blonde haired soldier turned to his left and saw Yin striding towards him.

The soldier asked halting his polishing "Can I help you?"

Yin spoke up curiously "What's a soldier doing on an academy flight?"

The soldier chuckled and put down his rifle "I'm hoping to become a student here of course, although I missed my chance to drop off. I was getting too much into polishing my gun, and bam! That's when I realized everyone else was already gone, just me and you here now I guess. Did you miss your stop too?"

Yin said now interested "An Atlesian soldier wanting to study at Beacon? That's pretty strange. And no, I didn't miss my drop off, I told the pilot to fly to where the general is, I need to warn her. I have a sneaking suspicion someone is going to try betraying her. I don't know who it is just yet, but I have a pretty good idea."

The soldier asked amazed "You're... not pullin' my leg? Really? WAIT!" The soldier jumped out of his chair shocked "You mean Simone? General simone?!"

Yin said taken back by his enthusiasm "Yeah, or as I like to call her, 'mom'"

The soldier said blinking twice "You must be Yin Kamen then. Nice to meet you sir." He held out his right hand for a handshake, and Yin just laughed "'Sir'? You're so formal and respecting. I'm just a student here at Beacon too, or I'm hoping to become one soon."

The soldier retracted his hand and said happily "Nice to meet you Yin. I hope we become good friends or whatever. Anyway, I guess I'll have to message Ozpin explaining why I won't be showing up for the initiation."

Yin said opening his scroll "I'll take care of that, now if only this bullhead could fly a little faster..."

The soldier said introducing himself "Almost forgot to tell you my name, Aubin Schmitz. Most people just call me Aubin."

Yin said shaking his hand "Good meeting you Aubin."

(teams and initiation and the first day at beacon is canon) skip and end.
111.title: Missed landing

1111.content:
The morning of the next day started with a bullhead landing with a pissed off yin getting off. As for why, someone close to the family and under his mother's command betrayed them. The suspect that did it was a friend of the family and his mother's second-in-command. They betrayed the army, his family, and the general.

“You made my shitlist, Frost.” Yin muttered to himself.

'I'll find and kill that bastard.' was an afterthought.

Then jumping off from the bullhead right behind him in dark green, waterproof overalls was Aubin who he just met yesterday.

Aubin said stretching and taking in the fresh air "Great morning to be alive isn't it Yin? General Simone is a lot nicer than I thought she would be in person."

Yin asked slightly confused at his attire "Why are you wearing what looks like a fishing suit to school?"

Aubin said looking over still tired, yawning "These are my casual clothes you know, that uniform gets really uncomfortable after a while, with the armour and all."

Yin said grinning while picking up pace as they split up "I'll see you later then."

Walking into the academy, he felt students looking at him and he put up his hood to keep his eyes hidden. He calmed down a bit, but he noticed juan and a cute rabbit faunus girl (velvet) getting bullied.

'Older brother instincts and dark guardian activated.' He thought seeing his little sister in the girls place. Juan sees yin coming to help, but noticed a look on his face that means 'dont stop me I'm pissed'.

“We should move.” He said to the bunny girl before she nodded.

The bully was wearing chest plate armor for his tall form and carries a large black mace when allowed (Cardin). He and his friends felt killing intent as it got colder and stronger before turning to see yin glaring at them while cracking his knuckles.

“Three of you will be done in five seconds.” He said.

The bully's friends were knocked out a few seconds later.

“Three seconds.” Yin said before turning his scroll to show the teams it was really three seconds. Yin had his cold stare full swing on the bully.

“I dare you to bully me and do actually try because I know I can kick your sorry ass all over beacon and vale. I will fight back.” He said as he judo throw the bully into a locker before juan pushed six random buttons on the keypad having gained some courage and a bit of revenge on the bully.

“Really juan? Really?” the redhead warrior princess asked him as yin calmed down.

“That was irony.” She added.

“Thanks for helping us.” velvet said before yin wrapped her in a brotherly hug and kissed her forehead.

“I saw my little sister in your place so I acted accordingly.” He said.

“Aww, I wanted to break his legs.” a hyper girl said (nora).

“Nora, why break his legs” a boy asked sounding like someone yin had met before.

'Monty?' Yin thought.

“You have to channel your inner monty to find the answer.” He said as the boy's eye twitched.

“Oum.” Nora said sounding like a monk and the twitching got worse. Yin chuckled before dodging weiss tackling him, caught a punch from yang, and let ruby hug him from behind.

“Sorry about yesterday ruby, but I had some personal business with the general.” He explained to her and she understood perfectly since he voice was low and soft.

He saw a black cat in hiding (blake belladonna) probably from his kinning intent from earier.

He turned to weiss who looked to be ready to charge at him again. “Miss Schnee, my mother, the general, doesn't need you stalker her or me. If you will continue, then you will force my hand and you will want to retreat into your own mind to cope from the shock.” He stated before she could charge at him again.

He left after nodding to ruby and yang; he noticed goodwitch by a wall giving him a small smile. They went to ozpin's office to fill them in for why he was a day late.

“Ah, the prodigal student has returned and a day late. Why?” the headmaster greeted yin who rolled his eyes at him and sipped his coffee.

“I didn't know you had a sense of humor, headmaster.” Yin said as ozpin gave a small smirk.

“In any case I had to leave with the bullhead because I had a bad omen about the general and it made me worried. For now she is fine and so is my little sister. My dad is helping both of them to recover from shock.” He explained briefly.

“What happened?” Goodwitch asked while adjusting her glasses worried for the general.

“A soldier under her command betrayed her, the army, and the family. The soldier in question is or was her second-in-command and he was a close friend to the family.” He said as his hand clenched the hilt of the wood practice sword.

“That kind of betrayal runs deep.” Ozpin said drinking more of his coffee with yin nodding.

“I have plans to catch him and there is a slight chance that I won't kill him.” Yin said darkly.

“So how is the general and your little sister?” Goodwitch asked him.

“It will be some time before they will be back to normal but she will need a new second-in-command and she will make sure that she can trust him. I can see that, but aki-chan might develop some trust issues from this too. I can hope that won't happen since I can't bale her out and she has to make her own friends.” he explained before releasing a long sigh.

“I took the liberty to locate that bastard since he made it to the first spot on my shitlist.” He said.

They talked about what he missed yesterday and the layout of the teams. He was given a key to his own dormroom as his spyder and yang's bike, bumblebee, was sent ahead of him are already in the room. He was also given a book of the classes he could take after his main classes are over. When he came out of the elevator, the cat from before was reading her book and was waiting for him.

“You have an affect on yang and ruby, but have a dislike for our schnee teammate.” She said closing her book as yin stared at the cover of the book when he recognized the title.

“Good book The story has potential, the love scenes are bland and tasteless, and the action is there with betrayal and mystery.” He said surprising her.

“How do you know?” She asked.

“Got an uncle who is a spymaster three times once removed who is a super pervert writes the books and sends me copies before he gets them published to hear what I think. I guess my mother was good for one thing; keeping me from becoming a pervert like him.” He explained.

“May I see your eyes? You dont have too if you don't want too.” She said and he knew that she was nervous about asking him that.

“Only if you tell me about your past with the white fang.” He said with a pure serious tone.

“Before You ask how I know, the general has former members before they turned violent in her army and I have trained with them.” He explained.

She was truly debating her answer, but decided on taking a chance on trusting the only son of a truly brilliant general. She told him everything about her past, the white fang, and her role in the group. He sighed before shaking his head, but he lowered the hood and revealed his eyes to her to keep the level of trust.

“I have never seen eyes like yours, but they are definitely intriguing.” She said and he chuckled.

“Not the first time I heard that, but wont be the last time either.” He said giving her a true smile.

“Blake Belladonna.” Blake introduced herself.

“Yin Kamen, but call me ace.” He said kissing the back of her hand like a gentleman.

“How did you get your eyes?” Blake asked.

“Special circumstances.” He said before giving her the short version of the story he grew up with.

“The story isn't known by many, but I will guess that the history teacher here knows it. I know for a fact that you aren't the darkness avatar because another one of my uncles, uncle raven, has a special set of eyes that can see who holds the potential to be the next set of avatars. He said that I'm the logical choice for the darkness avatar.” He explained to blake.

Yin stopped walking to see an ice queen (Weiss) standing a few feet from him and he know something changed her while he was gone with blake and his visit to the headmaster's office.

“My sister told me to tell you that she is helping your father to help your mother and your little sister. Also your mother made a deal with me.” Weiss said as yin let the information soak in his mind.

“What deal?” He asked her.

“If I can gain your trust or be the friend that you need, then she would meet with me for a private chat. To be honest, I'm more interested with how she made her army with both humans and faunus than her weapon.” Weiss explain.

Yin chuckled, but shook his head in thought. “She still uses me for testing trust of others.” he said to himself.

“Ok, but you only get a few chances and I'm more surprised with the general.” He said before weiss nodded.

“Another thing is that you could help train someone and that will add a few more points in your favor. Plus you can help ruby fill her role as your and blake's team leader.” He added as weiss nodded while her mind flashed back to her talk with a portly professor who had a handlebar mustache (professor porter).

“I'm not on the team, but I will do what I can to help her since I can think of strategies like the general.” He said.

The three walked back to the cafeteria where the two sisters are plus the other team with juan as its leader. Yin got his food for lunch and to him its similar to what his mother makes for him.
1111.title: First day at Beacon

11111.content:
“The quality is on the same level, but nothing can beat a homemade meal.” He said as he sit by ruby and across from juan.

“I have two prepositions for both teams. The first one is for juan and the need for training.” Yin said acting as a negotiator and both teams looking at juan and him.

”Weiss agreed to train him and I would like his own team to help her train him.” He added.

“What is in it for us?” Nora asked slamming her fist into the table.

“Pancakes for the pancake queen, warrior princess-” Yin started before said warrior princess cut him off.

“Pyrrha Nikos.” She said smiling while yin was watching her in thought.

“Well juan, this is your lucky day. You have the untouchable maiden as your partner.” Yin said returning the smile to the warrior princess.

“I don't want anything in return for helping my partner.” She said and yin nodded.

“What about our resident monk (ren)?” Yin asked as he noticed an eye twitch.

“I can't think of anything.” Ren said shrugging his shoulders.

“Ok so after classes are over, I will go into detail on how to help you.” Yin said as he finished his lunch and switched seats to sit next to him and across from ruby.

“My other deal is for your team, ruby.” He said

“What is it?” She asked.

“I myself would need your help with making my own weapons as we talked bafore. Yang to be my sparring partner, weiss to teach me in glyphs, and blake in shadow control. I have seen the initiation for your team. I will return the help with a gift or something for a reward, but I'm asking for help with triggering my semblance.” Yin said to them.

“Helping ruby, juan, and you. I will have to keep a close eye on the time, but prioritizing is a must.” Weiss said agreeing to help him and gain his trust.

“Of course I would help you make your weapons. You are like my best friend and the team aside from yang is like my sisters-in-arms.” Ruby said nodding her head.

“Since you have your mom to focus on yesterday I guess I have to use this chance to see how skilled you are.” Yang said agreeing as well.

They looked to blake who had yet to answer, but she sighed before offering a small smile.

“Sure I can help you with my shadow control, but you have to spar with us so we can see your skills in combat.” Blake said and Yin nodded.

“I know I won't have your abilities, but I'm more into the methods for controlling my aura.” He said as blake nodded.

“Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; give a man a fishing rod and you feed him for a lifetime.” Blake said as he chuckled.

“Ruby outside of the deal I will be helping you and juan to fill your role as team leader for your own teams. I don't have my own yet and I think the headmaster will pick them out or do something to show my talent.” He said as they nodded.

“I have the parts and the dust crystals in my scroll, which was made custom so I can store things into it.” Yin told ruby and answered the unasked question about his scroll from the teams at their table.

“When you get them?” Ruby asked happy to help make a new weapon.

“The night when we stopped that walking cliché from escaping with the dust and you plus goodwitch met my mother. He explained and she nodded remembering that night.

“I didn't see your face, but I saw the back of your cloak with those four symbols on it.” She said and he nodded.

“My little sister had put glitter dust on it with our mother helping her.” He said and she nodded.

“I know you have your secrets, but you have to give them up if you want to know my secrets. My eyes is a good example. The price for seeing them is to give me your biggest secret and I will keep my side of the deal. Only two people outside of the family has seen my eyes and I hope that number grows.” He said before getting up and walking out, leaving both teams to mull over what he just discussed with them.

As he was leaving the cafeteria, he collided with another student, he barely moved but the student fell back on her posterior.

She had long well kept, straight flowing cherry coloured hair. With a single braid running down to her hip. She was an average build and about average height for a young woman. She had pale skin. She was wearing a white lily in her hair for some reason. She wore a red cardigan with yellow buttons, and a slightly darker red shaded pair of trackbottoms and pink sneakers. Now that he had a better look at her she appeared to be quite light, maybe even anorexic.

She blinks twice and looks up at him rubbing her head. Yin offers to help her up extending his right hand.

She takes his hand after a moment of hesitation and looks down at some books she dropped when they slammed into each other. She quickly picks them up and says bowing to him "Sorry, sorry! My mistake I was trying to... give these to Glynda. I thought she was here a minute ago?"

Yin explained to her crossing his arms sighing "She just left actually, she was here a few minutes ago but I didn't see where she went. What does she need those for anyway?" He asked pointing at the books, they were clearly training manuals and he didn't believe for a minute Glynda needed training.

She looked at the ground silent for a minute and looked to the right nervously. She sighed and spoke up beginning to panic slightly "I uh, no that's not what I - see these are actually..." She sighed and said defeated as lines students were passing them by "Yeah... it's embarrassing but they're actually for me. I was looking for someone to help study with, the reason I was running was because I missed the initiation yesterday. I messed up big time so I want to get in lots of study to make up for it."

Yin held out his hand offeringly, she gave him one of the books and he opened it up. Reading through it, he asked surprised "This is some pretty advanced stuff you know, how to treat deep lacerations. How to ward off beowulfs without a weapon, proper handling of unstable dust crystals?"

The girl said slightly annoyed "That's why I need a study partner!"

Yin said handing her the book back "I don't think you should be studying at this level yet, it seems a bit too extreme for the very first year here."

The girl said with one final sigh scratching her hair with her left hand "Yeah, yeah I know... I just wanted to show off a little I guess. I've already seen Ozpin about who will be on my team but he said some other students that are required for what he's planning haven't shown up to Beacon today. Either that or they're hiding, maybe ditching lessons."

Yin finally asked her the important question "What's your name?"

The girl looked up at him and spoke with a smile on her face "It's Razz, Razz Blank. I know it's a little weird for a name but that's it, heh."

Yin spoke as the line of students heading into the cafeteria had mostly stopped, leaving them more peace to talk "Not at all actually, my name's Yin."

Razz asked interested "Like yin and yang? That peace symbol or something?"

Yin uttered kind of embarrassed "More like good and bad, can't have light without dark. Anyway, I've got to go. Good luck with your study."

Razz said waving him off as he walked down the stone path "Ok bye Yin, nice meeting you!" After that last sentence she felt kind of awkward and hurried into the cafeteria, irritated that she now has to wait in the long queue for her food.
11111.title: New friends

111111.content:
He unlocked the door of his room and went to sit in his chair. She watched him sit there wondering what was on his mind. He got up for a minute and turned on some music before getting back into his chair, but kept low for both to hear and still be able to talk and hear each other.

“So what are you thinking about?” yang asked.

“Mulitple things.” he said and she nodded.

“So snow queen is the only one who hasn't seen my eyes or team JPNR hasn't seen them either.” He said

“I want to see how your team and their team stacks up agaisnt me, but I have to get a weapon since this bokken can do so much before I can't use it anymore.” He said and she smirk.

“Sooner or later it will be a bokken sword.” she said and he shook his head at her.

They went over to her bike and they actually were working on it so it can be the best for her and have more horse power in the motor without causing any damage to the performance or the control.

“If you were the light twin or a maiden of the season. You would be a sister to me and nothing more.” he said

“What? No forbidden love between us or a small group of girls just for you, dark knight?” She asked and he chuckled.

“They have to be on your team level of power and be able to handle me when I finally let the anger building inside of me go and use it on my opponents.” He said.

“Are you saying that my team can't handle you?” She asked smirking.

“Choosing to not fall for that obvious trap, but I have a growing rage and I have it under control till something like your team or someone close to me gets hurt.” He said and she knew he was being serious about it.

Soon it was team for bed and yang had to go, but not before yin handing her three cookies in a small bag of their own.

“Rubes, would be sad if she didn't get a cookie and I thought it would be fair if blake and snowy got one too.” He said and she smiled gently at him at his thoughtfulness of her sister.

“I'm sure that she and they would like the cookies if ruby would let them try one each.” She said before leaving his room and he closed his door.

He sighed before glaring at the picture of him with his mother, raven, and summer on the desk he was using till he got his own team. He slowly walked up to the desk and sit in the chair looking at the ceiling in thought before looking at the moon through the window.

“You know raven, yang is hurting from you leaving her and taiyang. I have dulled her rage towards you, but you better be ready to be there for her, him, and ruby. I want to see their supermom again like before that mission and prove that you were wrong about leading the tribe.” He said with a hollowed tone and his eyes would have froze any and everyone in fear just by how cold his glare was.

He pulled out the plans he had long drew up for his own weapons in the style of gunblade as a new type of weapon use in the world that he with his family and friends live in. Tracing the layout of the weapons with a finger, he pulled out his scroll and started to line up the parts before he put the dust crystals into the chamber parts of his future gunblades. With gentle care, he was letting his mind and body drive as he was putting the parts together forming the hilt handles. He made sure that both were secured especially the dust chambers before shifting his focus onto the blades with the gun barrels inside them.

He has a total of 12 metals and he divided them up equally before taking them, the plans, the hilt handles, scroll, and tools. Silently leaving his room, for the forge in the tower that the headmaster gave him permission to use during his stay. While the forge was heating up to the right temperature for metal working, he was wielding the two groups of metal into two stacks and them on two metal poles. Using his aura to help shape the metal after getting it white-hot, he used a dust powered hammer to lengthen the metal and both form a pair of blades. He had been sure to not let his control slip while quenching the metal blades. He went over to the clay and put it on for a clay quench to get a hamon line as he thought to get a fuller in them soon. He tested his blades to make sure that they were hard and there were no problems with them. He had gotten a bit of a perfectionist from both his parents.

He put an etching on both of the blades before taking the blades over to the drill press for drilling holes in the blades so bullets and dust bullets could be fired. After drilling the holes, he made sure that the holes were lined up with the dust chamber and used a bit of his aura on a small ice dust crystal with a control amount.

A dust shot hit a wall away from all the forging equipment and it froze a quarter of the wall before breaking apart not leaving any traces. The barrels in the blades have a twist like a coil to put a spin on the bullet fired from the chamber. After setting the new minted weapons down on an anvil, he put a twisted screw boltnut as a final piece in the guard where it meet the base of the blades to keep them locked in place. (AN: the guard has a little bit of folding metal to help lock the blades in place while the screw boltnut further locks it in place). Seeing the time was around 2 in the morning, he knew he spent most of the night working on his new weapons.

He sat on a table after being sure that the forge was turned off and pulled out a pair of black sheaths for his new blades. He sheathed his blades and was pleased to see them fit perfectly. He tied the sheaths to his sides before testing his draw speed and cocking the hammers on the chambers. The pair of blades are 8 feet long and thicker to even out the length so there is no thin spots where they shouldn't be.

He hold out his bokken with both hands praying over it and had the thought of writing seals on the bokken in the form of art. (Not the same as glyphs like wiess can do, but I more of a seal type use myself.) He pulled out some ink and a small set of brushes to write on the blade and hilt of the bokken. On each side of the bokken is a line of words from a dead language as he use his aura to burn the ink into the bokken.

'I think I will use my bokken and my aura so I can save my real weapons for the real fights.' He thought of a plan for the first half of the tournament.
111111.title: Sometime later...

1111111.content:
'Wait. Grizz, Aubin, Razz, and me.' Thinking for a moment, he was chuckling for a good bit.

“Team GRAY like Team RWBY.' he packed up everything and made sure that everything was like before he visited the forge.

He wore his new weapons on his sides while resting his bokken on his shoulder and he came to the courtyard of the school looking at the moon with a solem look before turning to seeing the headmaster with goodwitch away from their posts.

“So you took home in the forge for the good part of the night making your new toys.” he said while yin nodded.

“It was easier to let my instincts take over like I was figuring out a puzzle. I worked out the hilt, chambers, and guards on them first before doing the actual forging.” Yin said as they nodded.

“May we see them?” Goodwitch asked before he shook his head no.

“Can't let anyone have a look at these before I use them for their first test in battle.” He said and they nodded.

“I'm glad that you stopped Miss Xiao Long from her fruitless search.” The headmaster said and yin nodded.

“However I'm willing to bet that a certain raven will be watching the tournament cheering for her daughter and student.” Yin said with a low tone.

“I know for a fact that you know about jaune's situation, but dont worry I have it under control.” He added seeing the headmaster smirk hiding as he sip from his late night coffee fix.

“How do you know what top secrets we have?” Goodwitch asked him narrowing her eyes as yin gave them a deadpan stare.

“My mother is a general no wants to fuck with for Oum's sake. The elder council included.” He said like it was obvious.

“Only raven and I can cause she let us and I like messing with her.” Yin added with a devious smile.

Yin sit on the edge of the fountain and look at the moon some more.

“I met more people who were late like I was and they were interesting to say the least.” Yin said to the two as he sighed.

“I'm assuming that you know which ones will be my partners.” He said and it wasn't a question to the headmaster.

“The ever line between black and white known as GRAY.” Yin said and the headmaster had to stop a chuckle by drinking more of his late coffee.

“I guess you know your partners as well.” He said and yin nodded.

“Grizz, Razz, Aubin, and Myself.” he said with a smile.

“Maybe you should get some sleep for the big day.” The headmaster said and yin nodded before yawning from all the work he did in the forge.

“Anything you need before I head off to the land of dreams, ozpin?” He asked and they were thinking about it.

“Call the general and see if she wouldn't mind helping us set up our big surpise.” He said finishing his cup and yin look at him like that coffee was spiked with dust or something.

“Any words you want to say before I try waking the tomato basher up?” Yin asked.

No answer came from either of them and he sighed before pulling out his scroll. He looked through the contacts on his scroll before getting to his mother's number and called her. It was ringing a few times before it picked up and a sound of something being smashed with a simple punch.

“Sochi? Why are you even calling me this late? Are you having nightmares again or something happened that I need to hide the body or bodies?” Yin heard the tired and the just waking up voice of his mother.

“No nightmares or bodies to bury unless you want goodwitch and ozzy to vanish from hearing what he just talked about.” Yin said and she simply muttered a 'meh'.

“So why are you calling me?” Was asked.

“Ozzy wanted to talk with you about something he was planning for the students that missed the initiation and the teams.” He said and he felt her sit straight up.

“Sochi. I'm sorry for that by the way.” She said in a sad tone and he sighed.

“If it makes you feel better when I find frost, you can have the first crack at him; but I get to finish him.” Yin said and she agreed.

“So formal or casual?” Was asked.

“Casual, but wear something warm. I'm used to the cold remember? Your and raven's training did that.” Yin said before nodding to the two head staff.

“Anything you WANT to happen for the big event?” Was asked and yin thought about.

“Two fights, One against team CRDL and one against my Friends in team RWBY; both on my own.” He explained and she was confused with the scond fight.

“The fight with the jackasses I understand, but why a fight with your friends?” Was asked.

“Cause it's a test to my skills and a test I will be going all out.” He said remembering the words he said to the all girl team.

“So it's one of those fights I see. Ok. I'll meet with them and help them out.” She said before hanging up. He sighed before heading off to bed himself.

Soon while all the students are sleeping, yin's mother or known as The general, was seen in the courtyard with the witch and headmaster.

“Why did you have him wake me up if you needed to talk with me?” She asked.

“He said something about only him or one of your family can wake you up without having to play tomato smash with you.” Goodwitch said adjusting her glasses.

“One time and he never lets it go.” She said with a sigh before fixing her long coat.

“He spent most of the night in the forge making his weapons.” Ozpin said refilling his cup with more warm coffee.

The general was more straight hearing that looking at them.

“I thought I saw hilts of weapons when he called me.” She said before taking an offered cup of coffee from the headmaster as goodwitch was drinking a cup of warm tea.

“So why did you want me here and now?” The general asked drinking her cup to half gone.

“We wanted to know if we could host a special event at your base for the students that missed the inititation the other day. Plus have the teams that were formed a test of their teamwork.” The headmaster explained.

She was thinking about before smiling a kind smile.

“I think that can be arranged for the school, but you have to remember that yin requested two fights alone.” She said and they nodded.

“Those can be set at specific times so he can rest in between.” Goodwitch said.

“And the main event itself?” Was asked.

“A two part tournament. The first part is the singles like for those missed the first day. Then the second part is the teams say like team JNPR vs team RWBY or the soon to be team GRAY.” Ozpin explained his idea and she was thinking it over.

“Sounds like fun.” She said fully agreeing with the event.

“How soon can you get it setup?” Goodwitch asked.

“Within a few hours, but it can be done tomorrow and I still have to get more sleep before I actually have to be up.” Simone said with a deadpan tone at the witch.

“Of course sochi with be the crowd favorite since he was training with the army while training with raven, but I think she can watch to see how little yang is doing and same with ruby since summer is still missing.” She said and both nodded reading the file given on yin by herself.

“How are you really holding up?” Ozpin asked with a more serious tone and the general knew it was about the betrayal of her former officer frost.

“My little aki is getting better more with winter there and sochi stayed with us after coming home with her and another student. I knew his father for some time.” She said with a sigh.

“As for me, it hurt when it happened. When I finally retired frost was going to be my replacement and had him train a new second-in-command. I trained him from the ground up with countless others during my rise to my current rank. Sochi wants to hurt him and I don't blame him. I however only want to know why he betrayed a family that treated him like he was one of them and what made him do it.” She explained finishing her coffee.

“Where did the issue of his eyes come from?” Goodwitch asked.

“During the training with the army and raven before he met summer. I think I had something to do with it since I'm his own mother. He had started to develop trust issues and almost always wear a hood to cover his eyes little before aki was born. But only she and their father would be able to see his eyes without the hood covering them.” Simone answered.

“I know he still cares for me as his mother; still I let him come here to find his own path not only as one of the avatars, but also as person that is not standing in my shadow. I sent him here to also make it up to him for the early mistakes that I made.” She added with a tired sigh like she was getting older from everything her job requires. Yin had hacked into his mother's scroll from his and he heard that last part.

He was standing at his desk and looking at the picture same as before while in a new frame.

“I already forgave you for that, kaa-chan.” He said in a low whispered tone rubbing his thumb over the pictured of his mother's face.

Yin went to sleep in his bed while his weapons are stored in the scroll as the adults were still talking about other things. His bokken was leaning against his desk with a light or ice blue glow to it. His mother perked her head up if she heard something like what yin had said before looking around slightly confused.

“Something wrong, General?” The headmaster asked.

“No, thought I heard something in the wind.” She said.

'Thank you sochi-kun.' She thought knowing what yin said as he slept. In his sleep he had a small smile on his face and went into a deeper sleep.
1111111.title: Headmaster and General

11111111.content:
It is early in the morning when the general was getting up from her warm bed as her husband was still sleeping on his side of the bed. She gathered her things before taking a cold shower and it woke her up as she warm it up to help her relax.

“So, I have to have the base setup for the tournament and I think winter will be able to help me.” She said to herself before ending the shower and went to get dressed.

She checked on aki who was still sleeping as she noticed winter was sleeping in a chair next to the bed with a book on her lap.

'Aki-chan must have nightmares again so winter must have read her a story to help her.' Simone thought to herself before walking into the room. She gently shook winter awake before keeping her quiet by pointing to the sleeping little girl in the bed.

They left the room so they went to the kitchen while winter was working out the kinks in her back and was able to pop it a few times.

“I didn't mean to sleep in that chair in her room, but she wanted a story read to her.” Winter said.

“Figured.” Simone said.

“What is it you need from me?” Winter asked the general.

“Sochi-kun called me last night for a meeting with ozzy and his little witch because they were scared to wake me themselves. They wanted to use the base for a tournament because there are some people who missed the test in the forest.” Simone explained and winter nodded.

“What do you need me to do?” Winter asked again.

“Help me get the base setup for the tournament and let the army know that their champion will be coming home.” Simone said and winter nodded.

“How do you feel about your sister being on a team with a supposed faunus?” She asked her.

“I'm honestly hoping that she and I can help heal the wound that our father caused. It's why I'm staying with you more than I should and your daughter reminded me of weiss when she was younger.” Winter explained.

“I'm just glad that your soldiers are letting me help them while I was helping you.” She added.

“They were betrayed like my family was and I'm glad that they trust you.” Simone said.

They were talking over coffee about some of the ideas for the tournament and her husband and the father of their two kids walked into the kitchen smelling coffee.

“I see the two drinking coffee without me.” He said getting himself a cup.

“Good morning sir/dear.” Both of them said as he nodded

“Our son called me cause oz and his witch were scared of waking me up.” Simone said and he nodded.

“You were always like that with me some times, partner.” He said as they share a small smile.

“What did those two want?” He asked.

“To use my base for a tournament for those that miss his test like when yin missed it cause of the former second-in-command.” She said and he nodded before flexing his fingers.

“That sumbitch will die between me and ace hunting him.” He said with a frown.

They talked for a few more minutes before the father left to get things done around the house as the two were about to leave.

“Kaa-chan, Winter-nee-chan, why do you leave?” A voice of a young child asked meaning the youngest in the house awake.

“Cause we have to get the base ready for when your brother is coming for a tournament that his school is going to hold.” Simone said and the mention of her older brother perked her up looking at them with bright eyes with little stars in them.

“Onii-chan is coming home?” She asked.

“Yep.” She said before aki was hugging her.

“He didn't make it?” Aki asked her mother as she was about to cry.

“No, my aki-chan. He just need to perform in the tournament while keeping in mind that he will get a team.” Simone explained.

Aki who is a small chibi version of simone, but is more like her father is able to keep yin calm for some reason. Compared to their parents it was a role reversal with the kids. Aki nodded her head as her mother let her down.

“You do as well as you have been and I might get your class or you to watch him fight in the tournament.” She said and aki was nodding her head so fast that it might come off.

Winter looked at aki and noticed that a younger wiess was standing over her.

'In a way she is like my little sister. It's that scary.' Winter thought before shaking her head to clear it and plan out the duties of the soldiers.

“Kaa-chan, Will winter-nee-chan go back to that ice place with the tin man?” Aki asked simone.

All three looked at her surprised.

“What do you mean?” Winter asked the chibi.

“I want winter-nee-chan to stay.” Aki said clamping on one of winter's legs.

“You mean as my new permanent second-in-command?” Simone asked.

“Yep. She is better than that icepick.” Ake said and the two were chuckling at the joke aki did with the former frost name.

“We have to see about that, but I have a person in mind for that position.” Simone said while thinking of raven and her tribe being the black Ops in her army.

“Who?” Aki asked wanted to know.

“An old friend that helped yin train while training with the army.” She said and aki was thinking on it. Winter got aki to let her go and aki went to get breakfast from her father. The two left the house for the base cause they have a lot of work to do. When they got to the base, it looked to be a compound to fit on a small island with everything they need to sleep, train, eat, and if the general needed it, a place to force the team to trust each other or force them to trust a new officer who did nothing that earned a certain level of hate.

All of the soldiers that were walking around outside saluted to the two officers. They nodded before making to a building that was their office and simone went to the PA system.

“Attention all soliders and personel, everyone is to attend this meeting and if anyone decides not to attend will be punished. I dont have the time for stragglers and I will say that punishment would be near frost level. It will be that severe.” She said before she and winter went to the meeting room where all soldiers and officers were trying to get in before they were consider like former frost.

Simone had a small smile seeing the soldiers and officers in the room waiting for them.

“Thank you for coming, but like I had said I don't have time so I will explain what the meeting is about.” Simone said letting the soldiers and officers sit down from saluting her and winter.

“Last night or earlier, our champion or my son, had called me because of the headmaster and his assistant were scared to wake me up themselves. They wanted to use this base of ours to hold a tournament for their school cause there are some students that missed the test like yin has because of the former frost.” Simoned had explained and all of them were cheering that their little leader was coming home to the base.

“What do we need to do?” One soldier asked.

“We clean this place up like we were getting ready for inspection and set up the contest hall.” Simone said and they all nodded.

“Good. I'm proud of you for keeping trust and loyalty unlike that frost. I'm glad that all of you are keeping to the code that I have taught into you.” She said with a smile and a sad look in her eyes. She hear steps and noticed that all of the soldiers and officers were coming to her and giving her an army group hug.
11111111.title: The next Day

111111111.content:
“General, You are family just like our little leader and your daughter is to us. That traitor frost will be dead if we or he finds him. Even commander winter is family to us after proving to us that she would not pull what he did.” One officer said and everyone was cheering for simone and winter. Simone was clapping to get attention.

“Thank you for the kinds words, but we are sort on time so squad up and clean.” Simone said as all the soldiers and officers left the room before turning to see a certain raven sitting on a rafter.

“Raven, not that I'm surprised to see you. Why are you here?” Simone asked knowing winter was confused at the moment.

It flew down before flying behind a support beam changing into her human form.

“I heard what was going on and I wanted to see how my student works in this tournament.” Raven said.

“You were thinking of your daughter as well considering that yin stopped her obssesion with you, but she just want answers from you.” Simone said and raven gave a short nod.

“Qrow's sister.” Winter said.

“And my son's teacher when he was young.” Simone said preventing winter from drawing her weapon.

“Have you considered my offer?” Simone asked.

“A little.” Raven said.

“What offer?” Winter asked.

“A place in my army and the position that aki-chan wants you in.” Simone said as winter was surprised to hear it again.

“Why her?” Winter asked

“Cause she helped trained my son for one and is tracking the former frost.” Simone said as raven nodded while keeping her frown on her face.

“Winter, can you go talk with james and see about getting some information from him?” Simone asked

“Like what?” Winter asked slightly surprised by the request.

(AN: Ok for those who knows of raven, i'm not keeping her canon fully. I have to change her a bit to fit my plans.)

“Your father and mother, but also that younger brother of yours. I have a bad feeling as a mother for weiss.” Simone said.

“Do you have a reason why?” Winter asked a little shocked.

“Your mother was part of my team before we disbanded and I was teaching james.” Simone said and winter nodded before leaving her with raven.

(AN: for those who don't know. I'm planning a twist with the lady schnee and it will be funny.)

“If everything goes well, I will have two under me and it will make me happy to have her and you, raven close by.” Simone said and raven nodded.

“I will be head of the secret missions with my tribe help you more than ozpin.” Raven said holding her mask like a performer. (more like shakespear play hamlet with the skull.)

“WE have to find summer and bring her back from where she is.” Simone said before hugging raven.

“You have to work with your brother despite your differences and that helps me out more.” She added.

Raven turned back into her bird form before landing on the general's shoulder as she walked out of the tent. The soldiers were working as teams preparing the base for the tournament the returning champ of their base. The mood was like electric and they were in a good mood. Things were getting done as soon as possible as the general wanted it. They were putting everything into cleaning and setting up the tournament as the general was walking around before walking to her own quarters.

“You will be helping me in here and winter's room while she is doing her own task for me.” Simone said to raven who changed back to human form. She nodded before they got to work in the rooms.

While working together over the course of hours, all the rooms was cleaned, the tournament hall was setup in the proper fashion, and the soldier's uniforms were pressed. Simone was inspecting everything like she had done this before and raven, in bird form, was on winter's shoulder as they watched their leader and proud comrade critique on every detail. All the soldiers and officers were tense cause their general was silent while winter and the raven were calm.

“Again like the times before and with that former frost, you have proven that you can work like a team and not be like you were before. I'm proud of you all and my own little soldier will be glad for you too.” She said with a smile after a few minutes.

Everyone is cheering for the pass they got as usual and they went to the mess hall for food and celebrate before cleaning it again. Winter and simone were smiling happy for the soldiers and officers, but all three were thinking about the coming event for the school. Simone left to make the call for ozpin to bring the school for the tournament.

“Hello oz, the base is ready for your school and you better bring all of your students. I will make the rules and be the final judge with two others.” Simone said on her scroll.

“That is some quick work.” Ozpin said.

“My soldiers are ready for their champion to return, but I have to talk with tinman, about keeping his assistant as one of my new commanders and placing another one under another branch that only answers to me and not the council.” She said and he nodded.

“We will be there later the afternoon.” He said and she nodded before the call ended.

“Attention all students, all first years will be taken to the vale's military base for a tournament that the General setup a place for and it will be for those who miss the day of the team test and for the teams that have been form to see what you learn. There will be two exibihition matches featuring two teams against one student, but this student would be the army's champion from what the general told me.” Ozpin said and yin knows who he was talking about.

“The older years will be watching from here and the general will be providing them the action. The first years will be taking a ship that brought them here and any misconduct will be sorted out with the general and miss goodwitch will add to it. Anything more may result in expulsion.” He added before he and goodwitch went to recruit the ship that brought the new students here.

Yin is smiling knowing that his mother came through for him on his two requested fights. 'Soon everything will start coming into place.' Yin thought as he had his bag over his weapons to hide them from view. To be fair he was getting excited for seeing the army his mother raised and led them to victory in every fight in the war.

'I can't wait for those two fights and I know how to fight with what weapon.' He thought looking at his trusted bokken rubbing it with aura like it is an old friend. “Real weapons will be for the fight with ruby and her team and bokken with the CRDL fight.” He said to himself.

He was the first one on the ship when it came to land. As he went straight to a room, he noticed CRDL was up to something again and he know cause he was getting vibes from them. He ran back to see that team about to bully Jaune again.

“Save your childish ways for the tournament and our fight cause your asses will be mine and you will be tasting splinters.” Yin said holding his bokken at cardin with a fierce glare.

They walked off with a off and yin stayed with his friend. “Jaune, you have to gain a spine or they will keep bullying you.” He said with a kind tone and jaune nodded. They with his team and team RWBY on the ship, but yin went to find a room for himself.

Yin is resting in his room during the flight and was preparing his mind for the tournament. He was thinking of the army that he was champion of when he was little. Getting an idea, he went over to his bag and was taking a shower as a set of clothes were on his bed. His new weapons were in the bathroom with him so he knows where they are. Soon after the shower and getting dressed again, ace had his new weapons on the bed and he was cleaning and tuning them. He kept his door locked so no one sees his first two masterpieces.

When he was done, he put them on his back in an X fashion before putting his bag on his back. Walking out of the room, the hallway was clear before he walked forward to a window. Vale was coming into view, but only barely.

'Will be there soon and the debut of my beauties will be unleashed.' he was thinking to himself.
111111111.title: Part 2

choices: The landing and seeing the army
1111111111.content:
“Yin.” Someone called out and he turned to see wiess walking with a stride towards him.

“What is it weiss?” He asked and it surprised her cause she was for certain that he would use that ice queen or stalker name for her.

“Am I the ice queen to you?” She asked.

“Depends, but you seem to be thawing out into a white or light blue rose.” He said.

“I heard from my older sister, winter, that she will be meeting us as she is acting second-in-command with the general.” She said and I nodded.

“Sounds about right.” He said as she noticed something different about him.

“If you are seeing two weapon handles, don't asked about them because I will reveal them in the tournament.” He said and she nodded.

“Promise me you wont tell ruby. I know how she acts with new weapons.” He said.

“Of course.” She said and he smiled.

“Yep. I think you are turning into a white rose.” He said and she turned her head feeling a faint blush on her face.

“How did you get those two weapons?” She asked him as the red faded from her face.

“Spend an all nighter making them while the others were sleeping in their beds.” He said and she looked to him shocked.

“It was like a puzzle to me mostly, but still don't say a thing to ruby.” he added and she nodded.

“I modeled them after her and your weapons, but only in the hilt.” he explained with a smile and she felt a blush return and was a little darker.

He looked to her and had concern for her by placing a hand on her forehead.

“You ok, Weiss? I think you need to lay down. You might have a fever.” He said. She backed away from him still blushing.

“Don't worry. I don't have a fever.” She said before her legs gave out and he caught her before she hurt herself.

He helped her back to her feet and let her walk back to her room.

“Yang, you make a pun, trust me you will feel of the wrath of dragon of darkness for xiao long.” He said seeing yang chuckling at his pun.

“Why do you want my little sister not to know?” She asked. He simply gave a look.

“Asks a million questions in a few seconds, but to me she is cute like a little sister.” He said and she nodded.

“Cause I want to see her surprise when I do use them.” He said and she nodded.
1111111111.title: Continue

11111111111.content:
Soon the ship landed at the port where the students were getting off. Yin was smiling happy to back at his second home. After the last of the students got off the ship, it took off leaving to refill before coming back to pick them up after the tournament.

“Hmm?” Yin thought before seeing the army cheering and he was waving at them.

“They are happy to see their champion back even if its for awhile.” A voice said and yin knew it was his mother.

“General.” He said before she hugged him.

“Make them proud, little soldier.” She said as ozpin and goodwitch were standing by her.

“Trust me. I'm done hiding.” He said with a serious tone.

He heard a raven and turned his head around seeing a raven on his mother's shoulder.

He narrowed his eyes before smirking at it. “Don't miss the show, sensei.” he whispered as the raven cawed and flew off.

All of the first years were led to the barracks where they will stay for the tournament. Yin watched them pick bunks for the boys. The girls are in the female soldier barracks doing the same thing.

“Hands off the bunk at the corner. That is my bunk.” He said as he claimed the bunk he slept on when he was younger. Aubin came up to him a few minutes later.

“You mind if I bunk with you?” he asked and yin looked at him with a lazy gaze.

“Sure. You take the top bunk.” He said.

They setup things into a footlocker for aubin as yin still has his own from his training here.

“Is everyone picked a bunk bed and their things into a footlocker?” Yin asked the boys. They nodded and he smirked at a certain group.

“Before I forget, any tampering with the bunks or lockers will be dealt with general and the headmasters. Trust me, you don't want her angry.” He said as he led the boys to the messhall. The girls were there and the soldiers were lining the wall. Everyone was facing his mother, ozpin, and goodwitch.

“This tournament may or may not be part of your grades, but it depends on how well you perform as a team and on your own. For those that miss the first day, don't worry today you will be made into a team.” Ozpin said as simone stepped forward.

“Now, for the rules of the base since you are guests here.

1. Stay with the group and don't wander off. If you get lost, ask one of the soldiers to help you find your way back.

2. If you sneak into one of the restricted areas then you will be treated as a traitor of vale and not even your parents will be save your sorry asses from me.

3. Regarding rule 2, Since the betrayal of my former second-in-command, im more in tuned to capture and torture and anyone I deemed a traitor.

4. I'm allowed to take anyone from the school and place them into my army instead. Depending on the additude will make your stay shorter or longer.

5. Lastly, any racist comments to the faunas members of my army will be dealt with by me. I dealt with it before from them and I will end it from any of you.” She explained and all of them nodded.

She led everyone to the tournament hall combat stage and the students were sitting in half of the stands while the soldiers were sitting in the other half of the stands.

“Now then before the tournament can officially begin, there will be two exhibition fights and two teams against the champion of my army before he left.” She said and they were looking around.

“Who is the champion and who are the two teams to fight him?” Ruby asked her with a hand raised.

The general smirked at the question and looked onward.

“The champion she is talking about is me.” Yin said stepping up on the combat ring.

All of them were shocked or at least surprised to hear that.

“As for the two teams I want to fight is Teams CRDL and RWBY.” He called out. He threw his bag to his mother revealing two weapon hilts and pulled out his bokken.

“I won't even need my two babies to beat the carnigan team.” He said handing his swords to a trusted faunas soldier by him.

“But why?” Ruby asked as team CRDL was rushing to the step up the stage.

“Beat them in their place and as for your team ruby, to test your skill as a team and my new weapons in a real fight.” He said as he was surrounded by CRDL.

“Ready?” Simone asked as they and yin nodded.

“Begin.” She simply said getting out of the arena.

Yin ducked under the weapons meeting over his head and he sweep the team off their feet with a simple move. Using some aura into a kick, he kicked cardin hard enough to send him flying into his partner and leaving a bruise.

“Did that hurt, carnigan? It shouldn't have because it wasn't even 5% of my aura.” Yin said as his eyes were glowing feeling the hate building.

“That was for velvet and the other faunus you bullied.” He added while his mother was looking at him with a look.

“Why did you allow him to fight a team on his own?” Goodwitch asked the general.

“To help vent the hate building up in him or if it keeps building it will explode on him and make things worse.” She said.

“I do have some thought on that arc kid. He could use some training in a boot camp or personally trained by me.” She added and they were looking at her like she was crazy.

“Tell me that you already figured it out. I mean I know he doesn't any training as a warrior and that is just from my role as general.” Simone said.

The fight continued as yin was using their anger to throw them off while controlling the flow of the fight.

“Carnigan, I swear we were taught this in combat class and your team has been following my lead during the fight.” Yin said as his eyes were glowing taking in the anger the team was exuding.

Cardin and his team were barely standing because of the minor pain and being led like an idiot. They charged at him on last time and yin was waiting for them for the last time. Yin was using his bokken to block before hearing a cracking sound. Yin look and seeing his favorite weapon was starting to break from the years of use and training.

“Had to be now.” He said.

He broke the clash and his bokken was cracking more. He jumped away from them to the edge of the ring. He threw his sword into the air and was channelling his aura into his hands. He caught the sword in his mouth while two swords formed in his hands.

(AN: I'm using zoro style for a second before his old friend breaks for good.)

“Even if my weapon breaks, I will still fight.” Yin said as his aura was glowing an ice blue all over his body.

“So come on carnigan, show me you got the bulls to fight grimm and live. This is no game we are playing and the time to be a bully has passed a long time ago.” Yin egged him on as he shifted into a stance that simone's eyes widen.

“Why that stance?” She whispered to herself.

“You know something about what he is doing?” Goodwitch asked.

“It's a fighting stance that one person has to train wielding three weapons at once.” She said.

The team charged at yin once more before he was smiling at the possible change in the team.

“Three sword style: Dragon World Burner.” He said spinning like a top and trapped the team in the vortex for 5 minutes.

Yin stopped at the team was not moving but not dead. The general stepped forward and raised yin's hand as the winner.

“Winner: Yin.” She called out and the army was cheering for him as he was their champion. Yin's aura faded and looked at his good friend as it finally broke in two.

He shed his tear for his friend and handing it to his mother.
