“I mean what I said to the carnigan team. This is not a game. This is life and there is no reset button. We are teams for reasons and that is to help those who can't save themselves. We watch each other's backs so there are no sneak attacks or surprises.” He explained to the first years.

“I won't hide or run, but I will rip trees out of your asses to make sure you get the point.” He added before leaving the arena.

He was close to the door when he was tackled by a small red blur.

“ONII-CHAN.” Was heard and he knew it was his little sister.

“Like the show, aki-chan?” He asked holding her in his arms.

“Yep, I know you will beat the others too.” She said and he smiled at her.

“Onii-chan, do we need to put bokken-kun to rest?” she asked about his favorite and first training weapon.

“If you want, I have to be ready for my next match against your favorite sitter's team.” He said and she nodded. They left as everyone watched them leave the hall.

Simone coughed into her hand for everyone to listen to her.

“The next match will begin in a few hours. Get something to eat and rest, Team RWBY, get prepare for your match.” She said as everyone left to follow her orders.
11111111111.title: The landing, settling in, and first match

111111111111.content:
Yin and aki were burning incense and praying for the soul of his bokken would find peace as it was a warrior in his heart.

“Onii-chan, will you go easy on sunny's team?” Aki asked him

“Nope. I wouldn't want the same cause I have my new fangs to use on them.” He said and she nodded.

“May the spirit of bokken-kun rest with onii-chan's new weapons.” She said clapping her hands.

He rubbed her head with a smile as they got up and walked to get something to eat.

“How is school? Anyone earns the dark knight?” He asked and she was thinking about it.

“I don't think so. Also pretty good. I'm trying like you would in class.” She said and he was looking at her.

“But you can't be me. I believe in the you that believes in you. Not the you that believes in me. You have to be yourself and try your best not be like me.” He explained and she looked at him with a cute and confused look.

He chuckled at her cuteness and got food for them.

“I think mom and dad can explain it better.” He said and she nodded still confused.

Team RWBY came over with food of their own sitting with him. Aki was looking at them.

“Rose-chan.” Pointing to ruby

“Snow-chan.” Pointing to wiess

“Sunny-chan.” Pointing to yang.

Aki was staring at blake longer than most and yin was smiling at both his little sister and friend.

“Kitty-chan.” aki said hopping over to blake and hugged her.

Yin and yang were snickering and blake was shocked at the the little girl hugging her. Ruby and weiss were smiling at the cuteness of the girl. Aki went back to her seat by yin and handed ruby a cookie.

Ruby had sparkling eyes at the cookie before taking it and hugging the girl.

“We are cookie crusaders and you are my second in command.” Ruby said happy for her new friend.

“At least I'm still your best friend.” Yin said and ruby turned to him nodding her head.

“Kaa-chan has cookies that need to be liberated from the cookie jar. We need to save them.” Aki said and ruby was going with the play. Yin was laughing at them.

“Ok you two. Aki-chan, your cookie commander is needed here, but then the tournament will have to start for real.” Yin said settling both of them down.

“But onii-chan.” She whined. Weiss had a flashback with her and winter.

“Hey how is Kuro-chan?” he asked her and she lit up.

“Pretty good, but misses you and likes my hugs.” She said.

“Kuro-chan?” Blake asked.

Yin look to her.

“A black cat I saved when I was younger while the general and I weren't seeing eye to eye.” He explained.

Aki was still hugging blake before yin got her off and back to eating her lunch.

“A piece of advice from me.” He said as the team was looking at him.

“Work together and trust in each other or it will be too easy for me to pick you apart. I want a real challenge from you four. Share your strengths, weaknesses, and everything else. When you do that, then I will take you seriously.” He said and they nodded

“Weiss, I can almost call you a friend.” He whispered in her as he and aki left to dump the remains of their lunch.

“He is testing us.” Ruby said after they were alone.

“What do you mean?” Weiss said.

“He wants us to be the best team we can be and there should be no secrets between us.” She explained.

“He knows me and ruby are two weak points.” Blake said

“Kitty say what?” Yang asked

“Ruby isn't used to being a leader unlike him and his mother. As for me, I still have some secrets of my own.” Blake said and ruby nodded.

“He is giving us a chance to change that and be a real team.” Ruby said before yang turned to see a raven flying around. She narrowed her eyes at it like she was sensing something from it.

'Something is weird about that bird.' She thought before turning back to her team.

Yin was at a waterfall training ground meditating with aki holding his swords on her lap. His body was glowing with aura before it was growing and blast off him freezing the water around him. He used his aura again to break the ice till water was falling down on him again.

“Why are you giving them time nii-chan?” Aki asked as yin was walking towards her and dry off.

“Because it would be too easy for me to pick their team a part and I have been planning to use my new brothers on them.” Yin said and she nodded.

“They need time to let the secrets out and to air them out like between ice queen and blake.” He said and aki agreed knowing that blake was a cat faunus.

“I thought you like snow-chan?” Aki asked and he nodded.

“She is a friend to me and us, but this is her final test and this makes or breaks my trust in her.” He said and she nodded.

Meanwhile, RWBY was talking with each other in a sealed off room provided by the general as they were taking his advice. By doing this, they took the shock away from this if yin decided to take the team apart by using the same secrets. Weiss thinking it over and knew this was something that could help or break yin's trust in her.

“If I was the me before I met yin, then I wouldn't been me that I am now.” (she means that she would be canon weiss) She said.

“Even with the white fang causing problems, I didn't have a good childhood growing up.” Weiss said before going into her own past.

Meanwhile, yin was getting ready for his next fight with team RWBY. He stopped before smiling.

'They are deepening their bond as a team.' He thought.
111111111111.title: Before The Next Match

1111111111111.content:
Soon it was time for the last match that yin was fighting against a team again, but he wants a real challenge. Yin is meditating in the arena waiting with his two sheathed swords on his lap connecting with them. Team RWBY came into the arena with their weapons in hand. They walked to the stage and the whole room was silent as a graveyard.

“So I trust that you were doing some team bonding?” Yin asked and they nodded.

“So how far will you go for each other? Better than the carnigan team?” He asked and they held determination in their eyes.

“All...” Blake started

“The...” Yang continued.

“WAY.” Ruby and Weiss finished.

Yin smiled before laughing. The tone of the laugh set everyone on edge except for aki and the general.

“All the way, eh? Well then, show me you got the skill.” He said.

“If there is no more talking, then let the match....Begin!” Was said before the general jumped off the stage.

“Monochrome.” Ruby called out just before blake and weiss went to attack ace at the call. Blake went to attak with her weapon as weiss was using her glifts and dust.

“Summer Rose.” Ruby said as she and yang went to join in the fray.

Yin smiled before jumping into the air. He pulled out his swords as his aura was surrounding his body. He used a blade to block blake's attack dodging the speed thrust from weiss. He noticed yang and ruby in the air before they became a spinning drill of rose petals and fire.

“Seems like I actually need to try hard here.” Yin said before the red and yellow attack hit him. The meters were his was at 90% and team RWBY was at 95%.

“Two Sword style: Four-Point Barrier.” Was heard as yin was still alive while inside a barrier of aura by using his swords and sheaths.

His aura meter dropped to 80% from the almost last minute defense against the attack. Resheathing his blades again, keeping them on his back before drawing them out. One sword had a black blade with dark silver streaks like lightning while the other sword had a midnight blue blade with ice blue streaks like lightning. The dark blade's hilt is built like a revolver with a six slot for the dust crystals as the metal is dark grey for the guard. The other blade's hilt is a shotgun or rifle gunbutt and the guard is a 12 slot for the same type of dust. Both blades are 8 feet long and sharp as a razor's edge.

“I will have to thank you ruby for telling on how you made your cresent rose.” Yin said. Using aura, he cocked both hammers making both guards spin selecting the first dust to use in this fight.

“What are those?” Ruby asked seeing the blades and going starry-eyed.

“Focus ruby, this isn't the time for your nerd side for weapons to come out.” Weiss said as yin smiled.

“Ruby-chan did ask an honest question, but these are something new and of my own design.” Yin said as the spinning stopped.

“Based on the general's own weapon, but it's not only a sword...” He started before pulling the triggers.

Twin sounds exploded from his blades as to blasts were aiming for the girls.

“It's also a gun.” He finished watching the smoke clear from the explosion.

When the smoke cleared, weiss was infront of her team protecting them with a shield of aura.

“Good weiss, I say after this you earned your prize.” Yin said smiling as said girl looked at him in minor shock.

“With time and experience, you four will be the best team.” He added before channelling his aura through his body.

His meter was slowly dropping meaning that he had more aura than most compared to what normal people had.

“Aura Doppelganger.” He said before three aura outlined appeared by giving him the look of an ashura with nine arms and three faces. The clones walked away each facing a member.

'Almost like my semblence, but it needs work.' Blake thought studying the clone facing her.

'I still need control over my aura.' Yin thought clicking his teeth as he was facing ruby.

Soon the fight broke into four smaller fights as the clones were following into his style. After 30 minutes of clones fighting they faded and his aura was 69% as the girls were at 75%.

'Enough for a last attack.' Yin thought tighting his grip on his swords.

“Season rush.” Ruby said as they stood back-to-back each facing a direction like a compass. Blake's ribbon stretched wrapping their hands together each holding a weapon. Seeing the team working, yin smiled a true smile as he flared his aura. They jumped with weiss's glifts and ruby is speeding them towards him.

“Three sword style: 9000 World's Dragon.” Yin said as an aura sword appeared in his mouth as he was spinning his swords like a whirlwind pushing them back.

Bullets were being fired at him, but it wasn't working and ruby had them add a spin in the opposite direction. Yin fired a dragon made of aura at them, but yang boosted their attack power. Goodwitch wanted to stop the fight, but was stopped by both ozpin and the general cause this isn't a tournament match.

Blake help her team dodge the dragon as they was getting closer to yin. The meters were getting closer to the red zone, but not there yet. When they got close enough, yin stopped to use his swords to block 3 of the 4 weapons as the dragon turned around and hit them causing a large explosion. The general went to check up on them.

“They are alive, but There is no winner. It's a draw.” She called out before the fighters were taking to the bunks.
1111111111111.title: To the match
